# HoverPhase.ended

**Case**

The pointer exited the view.

## Declaration

```swift
case ended
```

## Getting hover phases

- **HoverPhase.active(_:)**: The pointer’s location moved to the specified point within the view.

items.description: The pointer’s location moved to the specified point within the view.
